meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a mushroom.
meanings.sent1: The forest floor had a mushroomy smell after the rain.
meanings.sent2: The soup had a rich, mushroomy flavor that I enjoyed.
meanings.sent3: The mushroomy scent in the kitchen made me crave a hearty meal.
meanings.sent4: Her hat had a mushroomy shape, looking like a fungi cap.
meanings.sent5: The mushroomy texture of the fabric reminded me of nature's wonders.

meanings.definition: Having the taste or smell of mushrooms.
meanings.sent1: The pizza had a deliciously mushroomy taste.
meanings.sent2: The stew was so mushroomy that it reminded me of the forest.
meanings.sent3: His socks smelled so mushroomy that we joked he had fungi feet.
meanings.sent4: The air in the room was thick and mushroomy, like a woodland.
meanings.sent5: The sauce was so mushroomy that it transported me to a fungi paradise.
